bioconda.name: bioconductor-trackviewer
bioconda.summary: A R/Bioconductor package with web interface for drawing elegant interactive tracks or lollipop plot to facilitate integrated analysis of multi-omics data

biotools.summary: An R package for Visualizing mapped reads along with annotation as track layers for NGS dataset such as ChIP-seq, RNA-seq, miRNA-seq, DNA-seq, SNPs and methylation data.

bioschemas.name: trackViewer
bioschemas.summary: An R package for Visualizing mapped reads along with annotation as track layers for NGS dataset such as ChIP-seq, RNA-seq, miRNA-seq, DNA-seq, SNPs and methylation data.
